title: Flushing spark - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: Note! As prerequisite, the scripts must be prepared according to Preparing and Creating Scripts for KPI Management . If you stop running a KPI-management system and want to make sure all the pending KPIs are sent to the Kafka output topic, use this spark flush command. $ flush.sh
